verbs.description: We [V: ’re] going to try something different today . Rather than pontificate yet again upon the motives of Donald Trump ’s supporters , I ’ll let a few of them explain themselves in their own words .
We ’re [V: going] to try something different today . Rather than pontificate yet again upon the motives of Donald Trump ’s supporters , I ’ll let a few of them explain themselves in their own words .
